00010 string stringop::itoa(int value, int base) {
00011         return ltoa((long)value,base);
00012 }

00015 string stringop::ltoa(long value, int base) {
00016         enum { kMaxDigits = 35 };
00017         std::string buf;
00018         
00019         buf.reserve( kMaxDigits ); // Pre-allocate enough space.
00020         // check that the base if valid
00021         if (base < 2 || base > 16) return buf;
00022         int quotient = value;
00023         // Translating number to string with base:
00024         do {
00025                 buf += "0123456789abcdef"[ std::abs( quotient % base ) ];
00026                 quotient /= base;
00027         } while ( quotient );
00028         // Append the negative sign for base 10
00029         if ( value < 0 && base == 10) buf += '-';
00030         std::reverse( buf.begin(), buf.end() );
00031         return buf;
00032 }

00035 char* stringop::ftoa( double f, double sigfigs )
00036 {
00037         char a[81];
00038         int prec, width, front;
00039 
00040         front = (f==0)? 1 : (int)log10(fabs(f))+1;
00041         if ( sigfigs < 1.0 && sigfigs >= 0.0 )  // fit number to tolerance
00042         {
00043                 double rem = fabs(f) - int(f);
00044                 prec=0;
00045                 int num = (int)rem;
00046                 while ( rem*pow(10,prec) - num > sigfigs )
00047                         num = int(rem*pow(10,++prec));
00048                 width = front;
00049                 sprintf(a, "%#*.*f", width, prec, f );
00050         }
00051         else
00052         {
00053                 if ( sigfigs < 2.0 ) sigfigs = 2.0;
00054          
00055                 if ( front > (int)sigfigs )
00056                 {
00057                         sprintf( a, "%#.*e", (int)sigfigs-1, f );
00058                 }
00059                 else
00060                 {
00061                         prec = (int)sigfigs - front;
00062                         if ( f==0.0 ) width = 2;
00063                         else width = front + prec + 1;
00064                         sprintf( a, "%#*.*f", width, prec, f );
00065                 }
00066         }
00067         return strdup(a);
00068 }
